description: Donald Trump is an unusual candidate, it's safe to say, but there is only one issue that really sets him apart from his rivals for the Republican presidential nomination. That issue is taxes, and Trump is open to raising them -- specifically, on the rich. His comments on taxes have won him ambivalent praise from Paul Krugman, the Nobel laureate and columnist for The New […]
title: Why Donald Trump is right, according to Paul Krugman
